label: 謀反
本: The Kamakura Bakufu:  A Study in Documents . Stanford University Press . 1976
説明文: The general term for rebellion, though never clearly defined. The Kamakura Bakufu authorized its shugo to assume authority over cases of rebellion, and regularly appointed jitō to the lands of dispossessed rebels (muhonnin).　[守護、地頭、謀反人]
